title: FriKommerce
functionality: User Authentication: Provides user registration, login, and password recovery using JWT for secure authentication.
Product Management: Includes product listing, filtering, and detailed views of each product.
Shopping Cart: Allows users to add, remove, and update products in their cart.
Payment Processing: Integrates Stripe API to simulate real payments during the checkout process.
Admin Panel: A basic admin panel for managing products and orders.
Purchase History: Users can view their past purchases in a dedicated section.
technologies: Front-End: React for building a dynamic and responsive user interface.
State Management: Redux Toolkit for managing the application state effectively.
Back-End: Flask for handling server-side logic and creating APIs.
Database: SQLAlchemy for interacting with the database, using SQLite or PostgreSQL.
Authentication: JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for secure user authentication.
Payment Gateway: Stripe API for integrating and simulating payment processing.
Containerization: Docker for containerizing the application to ensure consistency across environments.
Styling: Bootstrap for creating a modern and responsive design.
purpose: The FriKommerce project is an e-commerce platform aimed at providing geek culture enthusiasts with a wide variety of merchandise. This platform offers a secure and efficient shopping experience, complete with user authentication, a comprehensive product management system, a shopping cart, and a payment processing feature using Stripe. With an admin panel for product and order management, as well as a purchase history feature for users, FriKommerce is designed to be a robust and user-friendly e-commerce solution. The project also serves as a learning platform for integrating new technologies such as Redux Toolkit, Docker, and Stripe API.

title: Guau...Guau
functionality: User Registration: Allows owners to register and add profiles for one or more dogs.
Dog Matching: Users can interact through 'likes' and 'matches' and chat in real-time if a match is made.
Search & Filter: Users can filter dogs by breed, sex, age, and location using external APIs and geocoding.
Secure Authentication: Implements JWT for secure user authentication.
Profile & Photo Management: Users can add and store profile photos and additional photos via Cloudinary.
AI Integration: Provides care information and breed compatibility using OpenAI.
technologies: Front-End Development: React, Bootstrap, CSS
Back-End Development: Python, Flask, SQLAlchemy
Real-Time Communication: Socket.io for real-time chat functionality
API Integration: External API calls for breed information and geocoding
Authentication: Secure authentication using JWT
Cloud Services: Cloudinary for photo storage
AI Services: OpenAI for providing care information and breed compatibility
purpose: GUAU GUAU is a web application designed to facilitate dog dating. Created as a final project for 4Geeks Academy Spain, it allows dog owners to find matches for their pets, ensuring they can interact and form connections. The application not only offers a fun way to connect but also incorporates advanced features like real-time chat, secure authentication, and AI-driven insights to enhance user experience.
